content:
Hey folks! :wave:
I'm Sam. I wanted to volunteer and work on the implementation of the recently merged RFC: https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2528
I was hoping to receive some guidance on the implementation from y'all :pray:
I thought I'd start by following the guide here to get my setup ready: https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/contributing.html
I'm not sure how the rest of the process works but, I thought it'd be good to have a plan of sorts to achieve this goal so that I can keep everyone involved updated about the progress.
Please let me know what y'all think! Thank you!
@Sam K that is indeed a good place to start
I'll leave some notes on the issue
you might want to "claim" it with @rustbot claim
